long_description: Fitting your single-child BOB Stroller, this snack tray offers a convenient platform for on-the-go snacks and toy time. Offers a sippy cup holder and a tray for snacks or toys. Attach tray to the built-in BOB accessory adapter on stroller. Attaches to all 2011 and newer BOB single-child strollers, sold separately.
short_description: Fitting your single-child BOB Stroller, this snack tray offers a convenient platform for on-the-go snacks and toy time.
